alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; North Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 1:24PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Itasca and southwestern Koochiching Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 124 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gemmell, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Itasca and southwestern Koochiching Counties, including the following locations... Craigville and Bois Forte Band Deer Creek Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
